mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(PRDUCT_NM, " - ", DLVGDS_ENTRPS_NM) AS EXPECT_CTRT_ENTRPS_NM , MATRL_CT_SN , CTRT_AMT , PRDUCT_NM , DLVGDS_ENTRPS_NM , DTL_CN , UNTPC , QY , mcp.PRJCT_ID FROM MATRL_CT_PRMPC mcp JOIN (SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY PRJCT_ID) pbp ON (mcp.PRJCT_ID = pbp.PRJCT_ID AND mcp.BGT_MNG_ODR = pbp.BGT_MNG_ODR) WHERE 1=1 AND mcp.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03701' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TEMP, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03702' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS PROGRESS, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TERMINATED_MY, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03704' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS DENY, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN al.ATRZ_STTS_CD = 'VTW00801' AND al.APRVR_EMP_ID = #{empId} AND ea.NOW_ATRZ_LN_SN = al.ATRZ_LN_SN THEN al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS PROGRESS_APPROVAL, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN al.ATRZ_STTS_CD = 'VTW00802' AND al.APRVR_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN CONCAT(al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID, '-', al.ATRZ_STEP_CD) END) AS TERMINATED_APRVR_EMP, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03702' AND rm.EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS PROGRESS_REFER, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND rm.EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TERMINATED_REFER FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ea LEFT JOIN ATRZ_LN al ON ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID LEFT JOIN REFRN_MAN rm ON ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} OR al.APRVR_EMP_ID = #{empId} OR rm.EMP_ID = #{empId}

( SELECT e.EMP_ID, ln.ATRZ_STEP_CD AS APPROVAL_CODE, cd.CD_NM AS ATRZ_STEP_CD_NM,
NULL AS ATRZ_STTS_CD_NM,
cd2.CD_NM AS ATRZ_STTS_CD_NM,
e.EMP_FLNM, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = e.JBPS_CD) JBPS_NM, NULL AS LIST_EMP_FLNM, CASE WHEN (ln.APRV_YMD IS NOT NULL OR ln.RJCT_YMD IS NOT NULL) THEN DATE_FORMAT(ln.MDFCN_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') ELSE '' END AS MDFCN_DT, ln.RJCT_PRVONSH FROM ATRZ_LN ln LEFT JOIN EMP e ON ln.APRVR_EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN CD cd ON ln.ATRZ_STEP_CD = cd.CD_VALUE LEFT JOIN CD cd2 ON ln.ATRZ_STTS_CD = cd2.CD_VALUE WHERE 1=1 AND ln.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT e.EMP_ID, rm.REFRN_CNCRRNC_CL_CD AS APPROVAL_CODE, NULL AS ATRZ_STEP_CD_NM, NULL AS ATRZ_STTS_CD_NM, e.EMP_FLNM, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = e.JBPS_CD) JBPS_NM, CONCAT(d.DEPT_NM, ' ', e.EMP_FLNM, ' ', (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = e.JBPS_CD)) LIST_EMP_FLNM, NULL AS APRV_YMD, NULL AS RJCT_PRVONSH FROM REFRN_MAN rm LEFT JOIN EMP e ON rm.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPT_HNF dh ON e.EMP_ID = dh.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPT d ON dh.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId} AND (rm.REFRN_CNCRRNC_CL_CD LIKE '%VTW00706' OR rm.REFRN_CNCRRNC_CL_CD LIKE '%VTW00707') )

SELECT (SELECT OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM from OUTORD_ENTRPS oe WHERE oe.OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID = oep.OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID) as EXPECT_CTRT_ENTRPS_NM , OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID , OUTORD_ENTRPS_CT_PRMPC_SN , TKCG_JOB , DTL_DTLS , CTRT_BGNG_YMD , CTRT_END_YMD , INPT_PRNMNT_HNF_CNT , EXPECT_CT FROM OUTORD_ENTRPS_CT_PRMPC oep JOIN (SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY PRJCT_ID) pbp ON (oep.PRJCT_ID = pbp.PRJCT_ID AND oep.BGT_MNG_ODR = pbp.BGT_MNG_ODR) WHERE 1=1 AND oep.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}
SELECT OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID AS PRDUCT_ID, OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM AS PRDUCT_NM from OUTORD_ENTRPS
SELECT MAX(ATRZ_LN_SN) AS MAX_ATRZ_LN_SN FROM ATRZ_LN WHERE 1=1 AND ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROW_ID , cd1.CD_NM AS CT_STLM_SE_CD_NM , CT_STLM_SE_CD , IFNULL(RCIPT_PBLCN_YMD, TAX_BILL_PBLCN_YMD) AS RCIPT_PBLCN_YMD , cad.CNPT_NM -- 거래처명 , cad.CLM_AMT , cd2.CD_NM AS EXPENS_CD_NM , cad.DTL_USE_DTLS , cad.CLM_PRPOS , cad.VAT_INCLS_AMT -- 금액(부가세 포함/세금별도) , IFNULL(CONCAT('(', DPSTR_FLNM, ') ', cd3.CD_NM, ' ', DPST_ACTNO, ' / ', DPST_DMND_YMD), '-') AS BANK FROM CLM_ATRZ ca JOIN CLM_ATRZ_DTL cad ON (ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = cad.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID) JOIN CD cd1 ON (cad.CT_STLM_SE_CD = cd1.CD_VALUE) JOIN CD cd2 ON (cad.EXPENS_CD = cd2.CD_VALUE) LEFT JOIN CD cd3 ON (cad.BANK_CD = cd3.CD_VALUE) WHERE 1=1 AND ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}
SELECT ATRZ_STEP_CD , ATRZ_LN_SN , ATRZ_STTS_CD , APRVR_EMP_ID FROM ATRZ_LN al WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_LN_SN >= #{atrzLnSn} AND ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

SELECT ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID , ea.PRJCT_ID , ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID AS EMP_ID -- 결재요청직원ID -> 직원ID(EMP_ID) , ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD , cad.EXPENS_CD -- 경비코드 , COALESCE(cad.RCIPT_PBLCN_YMD, cad.TAX_BILL_PBLCN_YMD) AS UTZTN_DT -- 영수증 발행일자 / 세금계산서 발행일자 -> 이용일시(UTZTN_DT) , cad.CNPT_NM AS USE_OFFIC -- 거래처명 -> 이용처 (USE_OFFIC) , cad.CLM_AMT AS UTZTN_AMT -- 청구금액 -> 이용금액 (UTZTN_AMT) , cad.CLM_PRPOS AS ATDRN -- 청구용도(참석자) , cad.DTL_USE_DTLS AS CT_PRPOS -- 상세사용내용 -> 비용용도(CT_PRPOS) , cad.CT_STLM_SE_CD AS CT_ATRZ_SE_CD -- 비용결재구분코드 -> CT_ATRZ_SE_CD(비용결재구분코드) , al.APRVR_EMP_ID -- 결재자직원ID , al.APRV_YMD -- 승인일자 FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ea JOIN CLM_ATRZ_DTL cad ON (cad.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID) JOIN ATRZ_LN al ON (ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID AND ea.NOW_ATRZ_LN_SN = al.ATRZ_LN_SN) WHERE 1=1 AND ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

SELECT cd.CD_NM, ep.EXPENS_CD FROM EXPENS_PRMPC ep JOIN ( SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC pbp WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}) pbp ON (ep.BGT_MNG_ODR = pbp.BGT_MNG_ODR) JOIN CD cd ON (cd.CD_VALUE = ep.EXPENS_CD) WHERE 1=1 AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}
SELECT cd.CD_NM , cd.CD_VALUE AS EXPENS_CD FROM CD cd WHERE 1=1 AND cd.UP_CD_VALUE = 'VTW045'

SELECT olp.PRJCT_ID, olp.BGT_MNG_ODR, olp.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN, olp.OUTORD_EMP_ID AS EXPECT_INPT_HNF_ID, emp.EMP_FLNM as OUTORD_EMP_NM, olp.HNF_ROLE_CD, cd1.CD_NM as HNF_ROLE_CD_NM, olp.HNF_GRAD_CD, cd2.CD_NM as HNF_GRAD_CD_NM, olp.TKCG_JOB, olp.UNTPC, olp.INPT_PRNMNT_YMD, olp.WITHDR_PRNMNT_YMD, dtl.EXPECT_MM, (olp.UNTPC * dtl.EXPECT_MM) AS USEFUL_AMT, dtl.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN FROM OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC olp JOIN ( SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId} GROUP BY PRJCT_ID ) pbp ON olp.PRJCT_ID = pbp.PRJCT_ID AND olp.BGT_MNG_ODR = pbp.BGT_MNG_ODR JOIN ( SELECT SUM(EXPECT_MM) AS EXPECT_MM, PRJCT_ID, BGT_MNG_ODR, OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN FROM OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_DTL GROUP BY PRJCT_ID, BGT_MNG_ODR, OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN ) dtl ON olp.PRJCT_ID = dtl.PRJCT_ID AND olp.BGT_MNG_ODR = dtl.BGT_MNG_ODR AND olp.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN = dtl.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN JOIN EMP emp ON olp.OUTORD_EMP_ID = emp.EMP_ID JOIN CD cd1 ON olp.HNF_ROLE_CD = cd1.CD_VALUE JOIN CD cd2 ON olp.HNF_GRAD_CD = cd2.CD_VALUE WHERE olp.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}
SELECT EMP_ID AS INPT_HNF_ID, EMP_FLNM AS INPT_HNF_ID_NM FROM EMP WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_TY_CD = 'VTW00203'
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(CRTR_YMD), '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS DEAD_LINE_DATE FROM CRTR_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND CRTR_ODR = #{crtrOdr} AND CRTR_YMD <= CURDATE()
SELECT ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID , STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(CTRT_YMD, '01'), "%Y%m%d") AS CTRT_YMD , ENTRPS_CTRT_DTL_SN , GIVE_ODR_CD , CTRT_AMT FROM ENTRPS_CTRT_DTL_CND WHERE 1=1 AND ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

SELECT ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID, (SELECT c.CD_NM FROM CD c WHERE c.cd_value = ca.CTRT_KND_CD) AS CTRT_KND_CD_NM, -- 결재유형 ca.CTRT_KND_CD, (SELECT EMP_FLNM FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID) ATRZ_DMND_EMP_NM, DATE_FORMAT(ea.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_TY_SE_CD, ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD, ca.CTRT_ATRZ_TTL, ca.CTRT_ATRZ_TTL AS TITLE, ca.CTRT_ATRZ_CN AS CN FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ea JOIN CTRT_ATRZ ca ON ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ca.CTRT_KND_CD = #{ctrtKndCd} AND ea.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}

SELECT ca.CTRT_KND_CD, (SELECT c.CD_NM FROM CD c WHERE c.cd_value = ca.CTRT_KND_CD) AS CTRT_KND_CD_NM, COUNT(*) AS CTRT_COUNT FROM CTRT_ATRZ ca JOIN ELCTRN_ATRZ ea ON ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE ea.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId} GROUP BY ca.CTRT_KND_CD

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT OE.*
,Z.OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM
FROM PRJCT P JOIN (SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY PRJCT_ID) BP ON (P.PRJCT_ID = BP.PRJCT_ID)
JOIN OUTORD_ENTRPS_CT_PRMPC OE ON BP.PRJCT_ID = OE.PRJCT_ID AND BP.BGT_MNG_ODR = OE.BGT_MNG_ODR JOIN OUTORD_ENTRPS Z ON OE.OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID = Z.OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID
JOIN MATRL_CT_PRMPC OE ON BP.PRJCT_ID = OE.PRJCT_ID AND BP.BGT_MNG_ODR = OE.BGT_MNG_ODR
) X JOIN ( SELECT A.*, B.PRJCT_ID FROM ENTRPS_CTRT_DTL A JOIN ELCTRN_ATRZ B ON A.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = B.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE B.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId} ) Y ON X.PRJCT_ID = Y.PRJCT_ID
AND X.OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM = Y.PRDUCT_NM
AND X.PRDUCT_NM = Y.PRDUCT_NM

SELECT A.*, C1.CD_NM AS HNF_ROLE_CD_NM, C2.CD_NM AS HNF_GRAD_CD_NM, C3.CD_NM AS OUTORD_HNF_CTRT_SE_CD_NM, E2.EMP_FLNM AS OUTORD_EMP_NM, E.EMP_FLNM AS INPT_HNF_ID_NM, O.TOTAL_MM AS TOTAL_MM_PLAN, O.TOTAL AS USEFUL_AMT, MM.TOTAL_MM, MM.TOT_AMT FROM HNF_CTRT_DTL A JOIN CD C1 ON A.HNF_ROLE_CD = C1.CD_VALUE JOIN CD C2 ON A.HNF_GRAD_CD = C2.CD_VALUE JOIN CD C3 ON A.OUTORD_HNF_CTRT_SE_CD = C3.CD_VALUE JOIN EMP E ON A.INPT_HNF_ID = E.EMP_ID JOIN EMP E2 ON A.EXPECT_INPT_HNF_ID = E2.EMP_ID JOIN ELCTRN_ATRZ EA ON A.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = EA.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID JOIN PRJCT P ON P.PRJCT_ID = EA.PRJCT_ID JOIN (SELECT SUM(DTL.EXPECT_MM) AS TOTAL_MM, (SUM(DTL.EXPECT_MM) * PR.UNTPC) AS TOTAL, PR.UNTPC, PR.PRJCT_ID, PR.BGT_MNG_ODR, PR.OUTORD_EMP_ID, PR.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN FROM OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_DTL DTL JOIN OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC PR ON DTL.PRJCT_ID = PR.PRJCT_ID AND DTL.BGT_MNG_ODR = PR.BGT_MNG_ODR AND PR.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN = DTL.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN JOIN (SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY PRJCT_ID) BP ON PR.PRJCT_ID = BP.PRJCT_ID AND PR.BGT_MNG_ODR = BP.BGT_MNG_ODR WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY PR.PRJCT_ID, PR.BGT_MNG_ODR, PR.OUTORD_EMP_ID, PR.UNTPC, PR.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN) O ON O.PRJCT_ID = P.PRJCT_ID AND O.OUTORD_EMP_ID = A.EXPECT_INPT_HNF_ID AND O.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN = A.OUTORD_LBRCO_PRMPC_SN JOIN (SELECT SUM(MM) AS TOTAL_MM, INPT_HNF_ID, SUM(MM * CTRT_AMT) AS TOT_AMT FROM HNF_CTRT_DTL_MM GROUP BY INPT_HNF_ID) MM ON A.INPT_HNF_ID = MM.INPT_HNF_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

WITH GIVE_YMD_DATA
AS ( SELECT CONCAT( SUBSTRING(CAST(INPT_YM AS CHAR), 1, 4), '.', SUBSTRING(CAST(INPT_YM AS CHAR), 5, 2), ' (', CAST(SUM(CTRT_AMT) AS CHAR), '원)' ) AS GIVE_YMD_FORMAT, INPT_YM AS GIVE_YMD, SUM(CTRT_AMT) AS VAT_EXCL_AMT FROM HNF_CTRT_DTL_MM WHERE ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{ctrtElctrnAtrzId} GROUP BY INPT_YM ),
AS ( SELECT CONCAT( SUBSTRING(CAST(CTRT_YMD AS CHAR), 1, 4), '.', SUBSTRING(CAST(CTRT_YMD AS CHAR), 5, 2), ' (', CAST(SUM(CTRT_AMT) AS CHAR), '원)' ) AS GIVE_YMD_FORMAT, CTRT_YMD AS GIVE_YMD, SUM(CTRT_AMT) AS VAT_EXCL_AMT FROM ENTRPS_CTRT_DTL_CND WHERE ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{ctrtElctrnAtrzId} GROUP BY CTRT_YMD ),
GIVE_ATRZ_DATA AS ( SELECT G.GIVE_YMD FROM CTRT_GIVE_ATRZ G JOIN ELCTRN_ATRZ E ON G.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = E.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE G.CTRT_ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{ctrtElctrnAtrzId} AND E.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' ) SELECT CASE WHEN G.GIVE_YMD IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( SUBSTRING(CAST(GD.GIVE_YMD AS CHAR), 1, 4), '.', SUBSTRING(CAST(GD.GIVE_YMD AS CHAR), 5, 2), ' (지급불가)' ) ELSE GD.GIVE_YMD_FORMAT END AS GIVE_YMD_FORMAT, GD.GIVE_YMD, GD.VAT_EXCL_AMT, CASE WHEN G.GIVE_YMD IS NOT NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS USE_YN FROM GIVE_YMD_DATA GD LEFT JOIN GIVE_ATRZ_DATA G ON GD.GIVE_YMD = G.GIVE_YMD
SELECT CTRT_ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID, ELCTRN_ATRZ_TY_SE_CD FROM CTRT_GIVE_ATRZ a JOIN ELCTRN_ATRZ b ON a.CTRT_ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = b.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}
SELECT COUNT(ELCTRN_ATRZ_DOC_NO) AS CNT FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ

SELECT ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID , CLM_ATRZ_DTL_SN , TAX_BILL_PBLCN_YMD , CLM_AMT , CT_STLM_SE_CD , RCIPT_PBLCN_YMD , DTL_USE_DTLS , VAT_INCLS_AMT , DPST_DMND_YMD , EXPENS_CD , CNPT_NM , CLM_PRPOS , BANK_CD , DPSTR_FLNM , DPST_ACTNO , TAX_AMT , CASE WHEN CT_STLM_SE_CD = 'VTW01904' THEN VAT_INCLS_AMT - CLM_AMT ELSE 0 END AS VAT FROM CLM_ATRZ_DTL cad WHERE ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}
